strings: <voice_0x01001CA9><se_high>Princess Medea: When you were captured and taken to that underground prison, I prayed for all of you.
<voice_0x01001CAA><se_high>Princess Medea: But most of all, I prayed that we would meet in your dreams, <hero>.
<voice_0x01001CAB><se_high>Princess Medea: No matter how hard I tried, though, I just couldn't do it! I even started thinking you might have died, <hero>...
<voice_0x01001CAC><se_high>Princess Medea: You have no idea how happy it made me to find you alive and well!
<voice_0x01001CAD><se_high>Princess Medea: Please don't go anywhere I can't follow!
<voice_0x01001CAE><se_high>Princess Medea: I'm an only child. You're like a brother to me, <hero>!
<voice_0x01001CAF><se_high>Princess Medea: Promise you'll never leave me!
